thread.title: It will be nice
thread.title_full: It will be nice - Review of Candlewood Suites New York City Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: andrewwL1620ME
title: It will be nice
text:
Walking in to a three star hotel I smells paint saw that new floors were in the lobby and there was a big tarp covering over an area the hotel was being redone.the elevator floors were really cool the hallways though were the rooms were were tight in a weird shape and carpeted.Are room deactivated twice and are room was what you get when you pay 30 dollars.It was a one bedroom one bath suite wit a smalll living room hardwood floor kitchen push button flush toilet and a horrible view.we on the highest floor with the view of a building the hotel was also veary sketches set up no pool and a fitness center in the basement.in Are room the bed was an average hard soft bed the pull out couch had no mattress just sheets in stings so you could feel the Metal in your back and since there was a third kid with us the hotel did not offer roll in beds so we had to make couch Cushions a bed what was the most comfortable belove it or not
Room Tip: Rooms on lower floors have better views See more room tips Green Features: One guy at the desk was veary good helping us find what we wanted at the city
